categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Save weight in your bag without sacrificing a good night's sleep. This 3-season synthetic pad is light enough for backpacking, and is thicker on the sides to cradle you softly. Texpedloft microfibre insulation prevents cold from sneaking through down to about -7°C.Made of 75-denier polyester with a thermoplastic polyurethane polyether film laminate that is hydrolysis resistant.Synthetic microfibre insulation is laminated to the top and bottom sides for loft.Baffles between the microfibre-filled air chambers create a thick, stable cushion without cold spots.Includes the Exped Mini Pump for fast, moisture-free inflation.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Exped Synmat Lite 5 Sleeping Pad - Unisex
